name: Keen Eye
description: This Pokemon has an exceptional sight, locating small or far away objects will be a lot easier.
effect: The User is unaffected by negative Accuracy Stat Changes (They still suffer from Multi-Hit Move Accuracy Penalites as well as Shield Move Penalties) and ignores Evasion increases on their targets. When the User performs a move, remove 3 Successes from targets taking the Dodge action.
